Package clientGUIControllers

Class CartProductController

java.lang.Object
clientGUIControllers.CartProductController
public class CartProductController extends Object
This class is a decorative class for the product view class, it takes the product view class, and adds information and functionality. The functionality added is the add to cart button when pressed on the scene, and the inventory label to show last quantity of a product or if it is out of stock. This class makes use of the tables: 'productinfacility' or 'product', which contain the product details
